entry.title: Current Conditions: 6.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Victoria Harbour 12:00 AM PST Tuesday 03 January 2023

Humidity: 68 %

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h except east 40 gusting to 60 near Juan de Fuca Strait early this evening. Wind becoming southeast 20 gusting to 40 early this evening. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers in the morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 near Haro Strait in the morning and early in the afternoon. High 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 02 January 2023
